name: current-weather-transform-lambda
description: An Amazon Kinesis Firehose stream processor that accesses the records in the input and returns them with a processing status.

scripts.awsdeploy: zip -r current-weather-transform-lambda.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name current-weather-transform-lambda --zip-file fileb://current-weather-transform-lambda.zip

author: TheryCN
